snippet.title: Myriads: Renaissance trailer
snippet.description:
Myriads: Renaissance trailer. Myriads: Renaissance is a turn-based strategy indie game currently being developed by Sleeping Eight Studio.

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1737220/Myriads_Renaissance/
Website: https://myriads-renaissance-game.com/

Music by Marma Music: http://www.marmamusic.com/
